summary: Replaces the Blades Sword model with an Imperial Sword, for those who don\'t want katanas in their Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This very simple mod replaces the Blades Sword model with an Imperial Sword, for those who don\'t want katanas in their Skyrim.  Nothing else is changed.  

Remember to endorse if you like it ^_^


I recognize that it goes contrary to the lore. I appreciate that some people want to stick to the lore of the game, and are happy with it like it is. However, for my personal tastes this is one place where the lore of the game is not very good. To me, Skyrim (and Oblivion, too) is a western-world setting and katanas feel out of place, so I prefer not to have them in the game.  If you disagree, that\'s fine, too - just don\'t download the mod!

By request, I have added an alternative version that replaces the Blades Sword with an Ebony Sword.
author: Aluminumfoil
